What are you in for?

Did what I had to do

What do they want?
You know what they want.

They alive?

‎内华达州司法部长

translation.en: of Nevada Attorney General William Fenton, who was found slain.

‎及州级警方共同合作

translation.en: to bring the person or persons responsible for these senseless murders to justice.

I'm working on my Rodent Roulette.

Yeah. In Indiana, we used to pistol hunt everything, squirrels, rabbits.

‎是啊 在印第安纳州
‎我们会用手枪射击一切 松鼠、兔子

translation.en: So my dad came up with this thing.
You take one round, drop it in the wheel,
translation.zh: ‎拿一颗子弹 放进转轮里

translation.en: spin it.
It's gotta land on that cylinder.
Squirrel soup.
And were you any good? Did you get any squirrels?
-[male cop] I never did. My dad did. -Hm.
translation.zh: ‎我从没打到过 我爸打到过

translation.en: So you were a failure in the eyes of your father?
translation.zh: ‎所以你在你爸眼中是个失败的家伙？

translation.en: -That tracks. That's cool. -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎看来你默认了 没什么的

translation.en: You're all cocky now 'cause you got that fancy Blackhawk.
translation.zh:
‎你现在这么牛逼
‎是因为你有了那把花哨的黑鹰枪

translation.en: You didn't think I noticed that?
Oh, I'm surprised you noticed it, sitting all comfy-cozy on my hip.
translation.zh:
‎你居然注意到了
‎这把枪正舒适地挂在我的胯上

translation.en: I'll quick-draw you for it.
My Redhawk versus your Blackhawk.
I got 30 seconds.
Don't let the sarge see us dicking around.
-You ready to do this? -Oh, yeah.
Today?
All right, you ready, gunslinger?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 准备好了吗 枪手？

translation.en: It's your move, cowgirl.
You know what? Speed kills.
-Oh, I can put my grubby fingers on them? -Every time.
translation.zh:
‎-我的脏手可以碰它？
‎-每次都上当

translation.en: Bit quicker, man.
Pops said he'd be disappointed in me.
I know who you are, pal.
I've heard all about you.
Legendary Bob Viddick.
Some chilling shit floating around about you.
translation.zh: ‎传说你干过不少耸人听闻的事情

translation.en: That poor bastard in Tampa.
You cut off his arm with a carving knife,
translation.zh: ‎你用切肉刀切断了他的胳膊

translation.en: and then you beat him to death with that same arm, right?
translation.zh: ‎然后用那只胳膊把他打死了 对吧？

translation.en: It was his leg.
I've heard about you too, Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎我也听说过你的事迹 泰迪

translation.en: They say you're very effective.
How are you not dead a dozen different ways by now
translation.zh: ‎你居然挺到现在 没以各种方式死掉

translation.en: is a cross between a fluke and a fucking miracle.
translation.zh: ‎简直是侥幸和他妈奇迹的结合

translation.en: More magic trick than anything really.
Mind over matter.
I give people what they want.
You take more than you need.
Yeah.
Hey, what do you say we cut through all the bullshit?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 不如我们直截了当地说吧？

translation.en: You wanna live?
That'd be nice.
Right, and you still think that's possible because you haven't been paying attention.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 你觉得你还有可能活下去
‎因为你根本没好好听

translation.en: -So you try to buy your way out. -Let's make a deal, man. I got money.
translation.zh: ‎所以你想买通自己的出路 ‎我们做个交易吧 我有钱

translation.en: The money you stole from them?
What you fail to understand, Teddy, is it's not about the money anymore.
translation.zh:
‎泰迪 你没明白
‎这件事已经不光是钱那么简单了

translation.en: There's no play here, Teddy, no deal to be made.
translation.zh: ‎泰迪 我们没什么交易可谈

translation.en: It's a simple choice.
It's never simple.
Are you a fucking idiot?
It is that simple.
I'm running out of time, Teddy.
So they're running out of time.
[Mitchell] Huber!
This is fucking bullshit.
[shouting] Will somebody get fucking Huber up here, please?
translation.zh: ‎能不能他妈的有人叫胡伯上来？

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Are you Huber?
You have an open-door policy.
I also have a no-pain-in-the-ass policy, but you don't pay any attention to that.
translation.zh: ‎我也说过别来烦我 ‎可你似乎没注意听这句话

translation.en: Twenty-two arrests, zero convictions.
translation.zh: ‎被逮捕22次 没有一项指控 ‎谁？

translation.en: -Who? -Our mystery man, Teddy Murretto.
translation.zh: ‎我们那位神秘人 泰迪莫洛托

translation.en: Have we impounded that abandoned Crown Vic yet?
translation.zh: ‎那辆被遗弃的福特皇冠被扣留了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I just sent Ruby and Barnes out to meet the tow truck driver.
translation.zh:
‎是的
‎我刚派鲁比和巴恩斯去找拖车司机了

translation.en: -Did you read the state trooper's report? -Why in the hell would I read that report
translation.zh: ‎你看过州警的报告了吗？ ‎我怎么有空读州警的报告？

translation.en: when I'm buried in evidence inventories that don't make any goddamn sense?
translation.zh: ‎我正忙着看这些狗屁不通的证据清单

translation.en: [shouts] Will somebody please get Huber up here now?
translation.zh: ‎能不能有人叫胡伯立刻上来？

translation.en: You know you have a phone.
[clears throat] There was a cherry light and a siren mount on the dash.
translation.zh: ‎车的仪表盘上有警灯和警笛

translation.en: Okay?
So here's my theory.
Teddy either stole that unmarked off a cop,
translation.zh:
‎要么是泰迪
‎从警察那里偷走了这辆便衣警车

translation.en: or he's impersonating a cop.
He's a fucking total bullshitter.
Wait him out 'cause we can hold him indefinitely.
translation.zh:
‎等他自己招供
‎我们可以无限期地扣留他

translation.en: Yeah.
Huber! If you are within the sound of my goddamn voice,
translation.zh: ‎胡伯！如果你能他妈的听见我

translation.en: get your big ass up here!
Don't make me come looking for you!
This motherfucker gonna make me come looking for him.
Hue!
Huber, you in here?
Shit!
This is some bullshit.
Anybody got eyes on Huber?
Kim, you see him, tell him to get his ass in my office right now.
translation.zh:
‎金姆 你要是见到他
‎让他立刻来我的办公室

translation.en: [Huber whispering] Listen to me, this is harassment, okay?
translation.zh: ‎听我说 你这是骚扰 好吗？

translation.en: I'm doing everything that I can.
I've probably gotten about a key and a half out of evidence.
translation.zh: ‎我大概从证据箱里拿走了1.5千克

translation.en: Do you have any fucking idea what that entails?
translation.zh: ‎你他妈知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: What could happen to me if I--
I know I owe you.
Yes.
What do I need to do?
Fuckin'…
Fuck Fireball, dude.
This fucking hangover is gonna be a motherfucking bitch if I don't get some aspirin in me too.
translation.zh:
‎如果不吃点阿司匹林
‎这个该死的宿醉会他妈要了我的命

translation.en: Aspirin's bad for your liver.
Cool, dude. Thanks. You a fucking doctor?
translation.zh:
‎行吧 伙计 谢谢
‎你是他妈的医生吗？

translation.en: [Bob] Yup.
Got my degree from the University of Common Sense.
[man] Huh?
Yeah, I didn't think you studied there.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你应该没在那里读过书

translation.en: [man] Huh?
I'm getting a sinking suspicion that, "Huh!"
translation.zh: ‎我现在开始怀疑 这个“啥”

translation.en: is the word that best describes you.
I'm getting the fucking suspicion--
Fucking fuck you, dude.
What do you got there?
Just a minute.
What the fuck?
What the fuck?!
You fucking set an alarm to remind you to get your ass kicked?
translation.zh:
‎你他妈设了个闹钟
‎提醒自己什么时候会被揍吗？

translation.en: I wouldn't poke the bear, pal.
translation.zh: ‎你最好别摸老虎屁股 伙计

translation.en: -Huh? -Oh, there it is again.
What?
[scoffs] Oh, that's good, change it up. "Huh? What?" Keep 'em guessing.
translation.zh:
‎真不错 会换词了
‎“啥？什么？” 让人猜不透呢

translation.en: [laughs] Dude, don't make me fuck you up in here, all right, man?
translation.zh: ‎老兄 别逼我在这里揍你一顿 好吗？

translation.en: You look like a fucking stepdad. I will slap the shit out of you.
translation.zh: ‎你看起来像是个继父 ‎我会把你臭揍一顿

translation.en: You're looking at a real one, son.
translation.zh: ‎我可是货真价实的混混 孩子

translation.en: I don't give a shit.
You feel me?
I felt that.
Hey!
Help! Hey, somebody help!
Hey! Help!
-Hey! -Help!
-Hey, help! -Hey, somebody!
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 帮帮他！
‎-嘿 来人啊！

translation.en: He's having a seizure!
False alarm. Something caught fire in one of these evidence bins.
translation.zh:
‎火警误报
‎证据箱子里有一个物品起火了

translation.en: Can someone please bring me a fucking fire extinguisher up here?
translation.zh: ‎有人能给我拿个他妈的灭火器吗？

translation.en: [female cop] We're on it.
Jesus Christ, that's loud.
What the fuck is happening?
Where you been, Huber? Sarge is lookin' for you.
translation.zh: ‎你去哪了 胡伯？警长在找你呢

translation.en: Yeah, his voice carries.
Hey, who's this?
That's the douchebag that clocked Young at the casino.
translation.zh: ‎就是那个在赌场打了杨一拳的混蛋

translation.en: Is he still down in holding?
-Help! -Oh my God.
Somebody please help this man!
He's gonna die! [laughs evilly]
Situation in holding. Get your ass down to holding now!
translation.zh: ‎拘留所发生险情 ‎立刻前往拘留所！

translation.en: -[Teddy] Help! -[Bob] He's gonna die!
[Bob] He's gonna die!
He's foaming at the mouth.
-It's not a seizure! He did it! -[Bob] It's like he's got rabies.
translation.zh:
‎-不是癫痫发作！是他干的！
‎-他好像得了狂犬病

translation.en: -Oh my gosh! -Don't go in there!
[Bob] He won't make it.
-What the fuck are you doing? -Watch your back!
translation.zh:
‎他快没命了 ‎-搞什么鬼？
‎-小心背后！

translation.en: -…prisoner doesn't appear to be breathing… -Hey, watch your back!
translation.zh:
‎-囚犯似乎没有呼吸…
‎-小心你的背后！

translation.en: Look out!
Oh, shit! Oh, shit!
We got shots fired. We got shots fired.
[Teddy] Help!
Help, he's trying to fucking kill me!
translation.zh: ‎救命 他想要他妈杀了我！

translation.en: Somebody!
You seem to have sobered up.
I'm gonna need you to drop that gun
and lower yourself as flat as a board to the floor for me.
You're shaking.
[inhales] Yeah, I'm nervous.
It's amazing I haven't blown your fucking head off.
translation.zh:
‎我居然还没把你的脑袋炸掉
‎真是太神奇了

translation.en: You assaulted my sergeant
and are attempting an escape.
There's not a jury in Nevada that would… blah, blah, blah.
translation.zh: ‎内华达州没有哪个陪审团会放过你

translation.en: Drop that
fucking gun.
Now.
All right.
What the hell happened?
We need an ambo in here now.
Check Sarge.
[cop] Was he shot?
No, but he was attacked.
And get the other guy up to the infirmary. He's having trouble breathing.
translation.zh: ‎把另一个人送去医务室 他呼吸困难

translation.en: -[man] …laceration to the head. -Give me your right wrist.
translation.zh: ‎男性 头部有撕裂伤 ‎把右手腕给我

translation.en: -Anything I can do to help, Officer? -Yeah, shut the fuck up.
translation.zh: ‎有什么我能帮忙的吗 警官？ ‎有 闭上嘴

translation.en: -[Teddy] I'm here if you need. -[female cop] Move!
-[cop] Let's get him on three. -The fuck you looking at him for?
translation.zh:
‎-数到三就抬起他
‎-你他妈看他干什么？

translation.en: -[cop] Val, you good? -[Val] Yeah.
Cuff it right there, to your left.
Show me.
You wanna check 'em?
Sit down.
-Sarge, sit up. -[Mitchell grunts]
All right, look at me.
All right, I think you dislocated your jaw.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你的下巴应该是错位了

translation.en: Gonna have to reset it. I'm gonna stick my thumbs in your mouth.
translation.zh:
‎我得给它掰回去
‎我要把拇指伸进你的嘴里

translation.en: One, two, three.
Okay, let's get up. Let's get up.
All right, get to the infirmary.
-Get the goddamn door! -I'm doing it!
Here we go. All right.
-Okay, that's good. -Guy's bleeding like a geyser.
All right, Sarge, I got you. Sit here.
translation.zh: ‎好 警长 扶着我 坐这里

translation.en: -Kimball, where's the ambulance? -Huber, help Sarge.
translation.zh:
‎-金姆伯 救护车呢？
‎-胡伯 帮帮警长

translation.en: This guy's bleeding like a geyser.
-All right, Sarge. -[Val] I think his windpipe is crushed.
translation.zh:
‎-好了 警长
‎-我觉得他的气管被堵住了

translation.en: Wait. What are you doing?
[Val] I'm gonna open his airway so he can breathe.
translation.zh: ‎我要打开他的气管 以便他呼吸

translation.en: Let's wait on the ambulance.
-[Val] Wait on the ambulance? -Hey, buddy. It's good.
translation.zh:
‎-等救护车？
‎-嘿 伙计 没事的

translation.en: Calm down. Just calm down. It's okay.
Hey, let's just wait for the doctor.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们还是等医生来吧

translation.en: All right. I did this in Army Medical Corp on a cadaver.
translation.zh: ‎我在陆军医疗队时 用尸体做过练习

translation.en: On a fucking cadaver?
translation.zh:
‎-尸体？练习前也是尸体吗？
‎-你开玩笑吗？

translation.en: -Was it a cadaver before you started? -Are you kidding?
translation.zh:
‎-尸体？练习前也是尸体吗？
‎-你开玩笑吗？ ‎我太紧张了 我一紧张就会讲冷笑话

translation.en: -I make bad jokes when I'm nervous. -We were trained. So let me focus.
translation.zh: ‎我太紧张了 我一紧张就会讲冷笑话 ‎我们受过训练 所以别让我分心

translation.en: Wait, aren't you left-handed?
-Fucking, you're left-handed, fuck! -Shut the fuck up!
translation.zh: ‎妈的 你是左撇子啊 妈的！

translation.en: Let's just wait on the ambulance.
Oh gosh.
Is he steady yet?
Yeah.
He's breathing. Is he breathing?
translation.zh: ‎他在呼吸了 他在呼吸吧？

translation.en: Hey, we… we did it. That's how you--
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们做到了 你就是这样…

translation.en: -All right. Keep an eye on him. -[male cop] That was badass.
translation.zh:
‎-好了 留心看着他
‎-太厉害了

translation.en: That was fucking badass, seriously.
Hey, this is Huber.
I was told to call you.
Yeah.
Yes.
Kim?
Fuck!
translation.zh: ‎（潜在指纹无法获取 待定） ‎妈的

translation.en: -[Kim growls] -Jesus fuck, Kimball!
Don't do that!
Motherfucker, what are you in my biz for?
translation.zh: ‎混蛋 你在我这里干什么呢？

translation.en: Hey, how long does it take for IAFIS to turn around prints usually?
translation.zh: ‎指纹系统通常要多久才会录入指纹？

translation.en: -They don't prioritize DUIs. -What does that mean?
translation.zh: ‎酒驾人士不是首要任务 ‎什么意思？

translation.en: Gonna take a while.
What's got you so curious?
-Curiosity. -[door buzzes]
Let's you and me talk, man-to-man.
Never more than a day ahead of the devil.
Tell me, Teddy.
[Teddy] Tell you what?
Tell me why Mr. Meryl Streep back there faked a DUI to get into this station
translation.zh:
‎告诉我
‎梅丽尔斯特里普先生为什么假装酒驾 ‎就为了进警局来杀你？

translation.en: for a shot at killing you?
I don't know. Why don't you ask him?
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 你怎么不去问他？

translation.en: Bob Viddick.
Why are you trying to kill him?
What do you care? You don't even like him.
Why is he trying to kill you, Teddy?
Okay.
Let's do this.
You can tell me everything, and I mean every last fucking thing,
translation.zh:
‎你要不然把一切都告诉我
‎他妈的所有细节都说出来

translation.en: or option two, you can keep smart-assing me,
translation.zh:
‎要不然第二个选择
‎你也可以跟我耍小聪明

translation.en: shrugging off my questions
with that stupid fucking look on your face,
and I'll put you and your pal in the same cell together.
translation.zh: ‎我就把你和你的朋友关在一起

translation.en: You're not gonna do that.
Let's not be ridiculous.
Seriously.
You can't do it. You're not allowed to do it, remember?
translation.zh:
‎你不能这样做
‎法律不允许的 还记得吗？

translation.en: Stop fucking around.
I'm as far away from fucking around as you can possibly get.
translation.zh: ‎我可他妈的一点儿都没胡闹

translation.en: You still drunk?
-Sober as a judge. -[Val] Hm.
-You gonna fuck with me? -Nope.
-Not you. -Problem solved.
translation.zh:
‎-要耍的人不是你
‎-问题解决了

translation.en: Look, this is way beyond anything you wanna get involved with, lady. You don't understand.
translation.zh: ‎你绝对不想参与到这件事里 你不懂

translation.en: No, you don't understand how incredibly fucking bored I am.
translation.zh: ‎不 是你不懂我有多他妈的无聊

translation.en: Okay, fuck it.
You wanna know?
I'll tell you.
All right, what I do, my profession, I put people together.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我的工作 我的职业
‎就是把人联系到一起

translation.en: High-profile people, like-minded, shared interests,
translation.zh: ‎志趣相投、有共同利益的高层次人士

translation.en: movers-and-shakers kind of shit.
Cops, politicians, entrepreneurs, heads of state. I handle them all.
translation.zh:
‎警察、政客、企业家、国家元首
‎我都会接触到

translation.en: Call it high-end consultancy.
You're a fixer.
[Teddy] No, I hate that fucking term. I don't fix.
translation.zh: ‎不 我讨厌这个词 我不是干这个的

translation.en: I manufacture… opportunities.
[Bob] She doesn't have to get hurt, Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎没必要把她拖下水 泰迪

translation.en: What he knows,
you don't need to know.
I'm all ears.
You read the papers?
[Val] That's mostly what I do here.
translation.zh: ‎我在这里大部分时间都在读报纸

translation.en: So you know about the Nevada Attorney General that was murdered last week, Fenton?
translation.zh:
‎所以你知道上周被杀的
‎那个司法部长芬顿？

translation.en: [woman] Bill? Motion's done.
[Teddy] The people I work for, they got their hooks into everything.
translation.zh: ‎我为之工作的那些人 他们掌控一切

translation.en: [woman] Just need you to sign it so I can file.
translation.zh: ‎只需要你签字 我就可以归档了

translation.en: [Teddy] When I say everything in the state of Nevada,
I'm talking about the gaming industry.
[Teddy] That is the summit from which everything else flows forth.
Now, my job is simple. I keep them talking. I keep them happy.
translation.zh:
‎我的工作很简单
‎我让他们供出信息 我满足他们

translation.en: This guy, Fenton, uh…
He was a crusader.
So you tried to buy him off.
[Teddy] Multiple times.
And he wasn't biting.
[Teddy] Not even a nibble.
But when they clipped Fenton, walls came crumbling down.
translation.zh:
‎但他们杀了芬顿后
‎一切都崩溃瓦解了

translation.en: He recorded everything I said with him,
translation.zh: ‎他录下了我和他的所有对话

translation.en: and he used that as leverage to get me to roll.
translation.zh: ‎然后利用这一点逼我告诉他犯罪活动

translation.en: Teddy, you're about to perjure yourself
translation.zh: ‎泰迪 你接下来要说的伪证

translation.en: to people that will butcher your entire fucking bloodline.
translation.zh: ‎会让那帮人杀死你的整个家族

translation.en: If you don't come clean, I can't help you.
translation.zh: ‎如果你不坦白 我也帮不了你

translation.en: The feds offered me a deal.
I took the deal.
What kind of deal?
Reciprocal.
-I'm invisible. That's where I'm… -Get people to turn.
translation.zh:
‎-我是隐形的 那是…
‎-让别人供出信息

translation.en: What do you mean, "What the fuck am I talking about?"
translation.zh: ‎你说“我他妈在说什么”是什么意思？

translation.en: High-level.
-People with their hands in the mix. -Listen to me.
translation.zh: ‎参与其中的那些人 ‎听我说 别再给我添乱了

translation.en: Don't bust my balls on this.
translation.zh: ‎听我说 别再给我添乱了

translation.en: And then one night, I almost got accidented.
translation.zh:
‎然后有一天晚上
‎我差点就发生“意外”了

translation.en: What does that mean?
They almost blew me the fuck up.
So I had to go to ground.
Disappear.
[Bob] Why don't you tell her about the money, Teddy?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么不告诉她钱的事 泰迪？

translation.en: I haven't heard you mention the money once.
translation.zh: ‎钱的事情你还一次都没提过呢

translation.en: What money?
Go on, Teddy, now that we're all "sharing."
translation.zh:
‎说啊 泰迪
‎既然我们都在“分享”故事了

translation.en: Tell her about the millions you siphoned off and stashed away somewhere.
translation.zh:
‎跟她讲讲你偷走
‎然后藏在某处的几百万

translation.en: -The feds knew about the money. -Bullshit.
[Teddy] It's not bullshit.
Lady, this guy will roll in your fucking guts
translation.zh: ‎女士 如果这家伙有机会的话

translation.en: given the opportunity.
I'll take my chances.
Hard chargers get charged hard.
What does that mean?
Wait, you don't know--
It means, if you push too much, then you get pushed back harder--
translation.zh:
‎意思就是 如果你用力过猛
‎那么效果反而不好

translation.en: -Doesn't sound as cool. -But it's meant to be helpful?
translation.zh: ‎这么说不够酷 ‎这话是为了帮我吗？

translation.en: -What the fuck do you think I said it for? -Okay. All right.
translation.zh: ‎不然我他妈为什么要说？ ‎好吧 好的

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you.
[Val] All right.
Take me through the last 24 hours.
The gunshot wound, the Crown Vic, et cetera.
All of it.
[Teddy] A pair of Vegas's finest drove me out of town to, quote,
translation.zh:
‎拉斯维加斯的两位警官
‎开车带我出城 美名曰

translation.en: "deliver me to the FBI," unquote.
It was bullshit.
These cops were bent.
I had a date with a hole in the desert.
Thank God the feds were shadowing me, or I'd have been totally fucked.
translation.zh:
‎还好联邦调查局在跟踪我
‎否则我就彻底完蛋了

translation.en: [FBI agent] Hey! Drop your weapons!
[man] Goddamn it!
[agent 1] Where is he?
-[agent 2] Over there! -[Teddy] Motherfuck!
[agent 3] Stop him!
Don't shoot!
[agent 1] He's in the fucking car! Get him!
[Teddy] Fuck!
Fuck!
Teddy Murretto does not die, motherfucker!
translation.zh: ‎泰迪莫洛托是不会死的 混蛋！

translation.en: [Val] This is Young down in holding. Kim, you around?
translation.zh: ‎我是杨 正在拘留所 金姆 你在吗？

translation.en: -Right here, sugar. -[Val] Are Barnes and Ruby still off-site?
translation.zh: ‎我就在这里 ‎巴恩斯和鲁比还没回来吗？

translation.en: On their way back with the tow truck.
All right, have the tow truck continue on here,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 继续叫拖车回到这里

translation.en: but ask Barnes and Ruby if they can reroute to the old Nomad Motel
translation.zh:
‎不过问问巴恩斯和鲁比
‎能否绕道去旧的诺麦德旅馆

translation.en: out on Route 95, just north of Lee Canyon.
translation.zh: ‎就在95号公路边 在里谷北侧

translation.en: Possible crime scene, multiple shooting victims.
translation.zh:
‎那里可能有犯罪现场
‎多个枪击受害者

translation.en: [Kim] There hasn't been a call out.
I know. Just have them radio once they're on scene.
translation.zh:
‎我知道
‎让他们到了现场就用无线电联系

translation.en: It's gonna be all right, Sarge.
We're gonna take care of everything.
How you feeling, Sarge?
All right.
He good?
Yeah. Yeah, he's still breathing.
Is that ambulance coming from Reno?
-It's fucking taking forever. -I'll ask Kimball to call them again.
translation.zh: ‎怎么他妈的这么久 ‎我让金姆伯再呼叫他们一次

translation.en: -Don't let him fall asleep. -[Huber] Yeah, I got him.
translation.zh:
‎-别让他睡着了
‎-嗯 我会照看他

translation.en: -Six-Charles-Twelve, this is Central. -It's Barnes.
translation.zh:
‎-6C12号 我是中央警局
‎-我是巴恩斯

translation.en: Gimme one second. I got Young coming up right now.
-[Val] Kim? -I got Barnes at the motel.
All right, I need you to find that ambo for me please.
translation.zh: ‎好 我需要你帮我找到那辆救护车

translation.en: -Got it. -Barnes.
Yeah, Young, what are we supposed to be seeing out here?
translation.zh: ‎杨 我们来这里是要找什么？

translation.en: Any signs of a shootout?
Shell-casings, blood spatter, drag marks.
-Need an update on an ambulance, please. -[Barnes] Nah, nothing.
translation.zh: ‎我需要救护车的最新消息 ‎没有 什么都没有

translation.en: All right, thanks.
About ten minutes on the ambulance.
Bad accident on the 15, southbound, backed up traffic.
translation.zh:
‎15号高速路南行方向
‎发生了严重事故 导致堵车

translation.en: Okay, can you do me a favor and run a name for me? Bob or Robert Viddick.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 能不能帮我查个人名？ ‎鲍勃维迪克或者罗伯特维迪克

translation.en: Try spelling variations on that last name.
Who is he?
I think he might be our John Doe downstairs.
translation.zh: ‎他可能就是我们楼下的无名氏

translation.en: Have the scans come back from my office?
translation.zh: ‎我办公室的指纹扫描传过来了吗？

translation.en: [Kim] No, not yet. Huber already asked.
translation.zh: ‎还没有 胡伯已经问过了

translation.en: About what?
The prints. John Doe?
Why the fuck is Huber asking about that?
[Bob] Can I ask you a personal question, Teddy?
translation.zh: ‎能问你一个私人问题吗 泰迪？

translation.en: [Teddy] I don't see why not.
[Bob] You had it all.
They took good care of you, didn't they?
Money, women, whatever.
Why in the hell would you give that up?
You could've kept going.
They would have never let you go down,
never see the inside of a courtroom
or that cell.
Should've just kept going.
I don't do shoulda, woulda, coulda.
translation.zh: ‎我不做那些“本应该、本可能”的事情

translation.en: Nah, you just light your entire fucking life on fire
translation.zh:
‎不 你只不过是
‎把自己的整个人生烧毁了

translation.en: and run as fast as you can, hoping that'll put out the flames.
translation.zh: ‎然后尽快跑掉 期望这样就能灭火

translation.en: You know what you've never been, not once?
translation.zh:
‎你知道你从来都没经历过什么吗？
‎一次都没经历过？

translation.en: Tell me, Teddy.
You've never been forced down the fucking rabbit hole,
translation.zh: ‎你从没被迫进入过一个无底洞

translation.en: making life and death decisions, Bob.
I do that every fucking day, Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎我每天都经历这些 泰迪

translation.en: No, you don't.
Those aren't decisions. Those are directives.
translation.zh: ‎那些不是决定 那些是指令

translation.en: Kill this guy. Kill that guy.
translation.zh: ‎杀了这个人 杀了那个人

translation.en: Wipe out that family. Fucking vanish another one.
translation.zh:
‎消灭那家人
‎他妈的再让另一家人消失

translation.en: You're a psychopath, Bob, plain and simple.
translation.zh: ‎你是个变态杀人狂 鲍勃 就这么简单

translation.en: I'm not a psychopath, Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎我不是变态杀人狂 泰迪

translation.en: I'm a professional.
And there's a difference?
You'll know it when you see it.
translation.zh: ‎等你看到 你就会明白了

translation.en: [Val] What about this other guy, Viddick?
translation.zh: ‎那另一个人呢 这个叫维迪克的？

translation.en: [detective] I'm not familiar with him.
Probably a cutout. Notched.
translation.zh: ‎可能是个中间联络人 传话的

translation.en: Mob mostly contracts third-party participants
for heavy lifting like this.
These are distinctly bad people, Officer.
translation.zh: ‎这些都是非常危险的坏人 警官

translation.en: So the quicker we can get Murretto to move, the better.
We found the bodies of his ex-wife and son last night,
translation.zh: ‎我们昨晚发现了他前妻和儿子的尸体

translation.en: floating in a runoff slough near Lake Mead.
translation.zh: ‎漂浮在米德湖附近的径流泥沼里

translation.en: Shit.
[detective] Listen, Teddy Murretto has made more enemies than I can count.
translation.zh: ‎听着 泰迪莫洛托的敌人数不胜数

translation.en: So, what did he tell you about this little daring escape he pulled off?
translation.zh:
‎他是怎么跟你说
‎他这次小小的脱逃经历的？

translation.en: [Val] That a pair of crooked cops got ambushed by the feds
translation.zh: ‎两名腐败的警察被联邦调查局偷袭

translation.en: and touched off a big gunfight.
-Have you turned up anything on that? -No.
translation.zh: ‎这件事你有什么发现吗？ ‎没有

translation.en: Not a thing.
Thank you.
[man grunts] That's it.
All right.
[detective] Yeah.
We got a big fucking problem.
We got a cop in Gun Creek asking too many fucking questions.
translation.zh:
‎枪溪城警察局里有个警察
‎他妈的问了太多的问题

translation.en: My kid okay? You get in contact with my ex?
translation.zh:
‎我的孩子还好吗？
‎你和我的前妻有联系吗？

translation.en: I talked to a detective at Vegas PD,
translation.zh: ‎我跟维加斯警局的一位警探聊过了

translation.en: and they're gonna send a car and do a wellness check.
translation.zh: ‎他们会派一辆车查看他们的情况

translation.en: I'm sure everything's fine.
Let me check my cell phone.
-You can't check it. -Let me just check it.
-Let me check it. -I'm sorry.
It's just got information for me that could put her in danger, okay?
translation.zh:
‎那上面有一些信息
‎可能会给她惹上麻烦

translation.en: [Val] When Vegas PD reaches back out, I'll let you know.
translation.zh: ‎等维加斯警察回来后 我会通知你的

translation.en: I'll let you know.
[Kim] Robert K. Viddick. All known associates.
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特维迪克 全部已知相关人员

translation.en: What do we have here?
[Kim] Don't these guys look like a bunch of fucking assholes?
translation.zh:
‎这些人看起来
‎真像一群混蛋 不是吗？

translation.en: -[Kim] Anthony Lamb. -[doorbell chimes]
[Kim] What kind of jerk-off name is that?
Manslaughter, assault with a deadly weapon, battery…
translation.zh: ‎过失杀人 用致命武器袭击 殴打…

translation.en: I have a birthday balloon bouquet for Officer Huber.
translation.zh: ‎我有一份给胡伯警官的生日气球礼物

translation.en: You look just like this fucking assbag down here.
translation.zh: ‎你看起来和这个混蛋简直一模一样

translation.en: Aw, come on, now.
-You're kidding. -No, you gotta check this out.
translation.zh:
‎-你在开玩笑吧
‎-不 你得看看这个

translation.en: -Look at this. -What?
You look just like him.
The resemblance is fucking uncanny.
Now, what are the odds?
Uh-oh. Hold on there, buddy.
Hold steady now.
[laughing] The boats are rocking.
I'd love to know what's going through your mind.
translation.zh: ‎我真想知道你现在正在想什么

translation.en: [EMT] Sorry, guy. Traffic was a bitch. What do we got?
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 伙计
‎堵车太厉害了 伤员在哪里？

translation.en: Thank God you're here. He took quite a spill. He's right back here.
translation.zh: ‎还好你们来了 他摔了一跤 就在后面

translation.en: -[EMT 1] Holy shit. -[EMT 2] Check vitals.
[EMT 1] I got nothing.
[EMT 2] You say he fell?
Yeah, yeah.
Well, to clarify, I shot him in the head, and then he took a little tumble.
translation.zh:
‎澄清一下 我先冲他的脑子开了一枪
‎然后他才摔倒的

translation.en: Oof! Dang.
What?
Are you--
Is that your blood right on my head, rush out of you and your head?
translation.zh:
‎你的血喷出你的脑袋
‎然后溅到了我的脑袋上？

translation.en: Imagine that.
Anthony J. Lamb, you gotta buy yourself a lottery ticket today.
translation.zh: ‎安东尼兰博 你今天必须得买个彩票

translation.en: Ooh, I hope they're Powerballing.
Kimball, where the fuck's that ambo, man--
translation.zh: ‎金姆伯 救护车到底在哪里…

translation.en: Oh shit.
-What the fuck? Hey, who the fuck are you? -Hey!
translation.zh:
‎-什么鬼？嘿 你到底是谁？
‎-喂！

translation.en: -I'm calling for help, man! Goddamn! -[cop] Easy, easy! What the--
translation.zh:
‎-我在呼救后援呢 该死！
‎-放松

translation.en: -What the fuck happened? -I'm just the balloon man.
translation.zh:
‎-他妈的怎么回事？
‎-我只是个送气球的

translation.en: I'm calling for help, buddy!
Goddamn, son!
Didn't you--
What is the first rule of policing, huh?
translation.zh: ‎做警察的第一条规则是什么？

translation.en: "Beware the unusual element."
And in this scenario, I believe that is me, Officer--
translation.zh:
‎在这种情况下
‎这个元素就是我啦 这位…

translation.en: Well, Officer formerly known as Peña.
[laughing] Peña.
Get down, motherfucker!
Flat as a board! Get--
What the fuck was that?
Huber!
I used to be a much better man.
What the fuck was that?
[Lamb] Oh, shit, now!
Hola! Well, that fucking blew.
translation.zh: ‎哎呀 还真他妈的炸开了

translation.en: How bad is it?
You happen to hear all that gunfire? Are you a fucking idiot, Teddy?
translation.zh:
‎你有听到刚才的枪声吗？
‎你是他妈的白痴吗 泰迪？

translation.en: That question persists.
I ain't talking about the gunfire.
Fuck me.
Oh, fuck.
[Val] You gotta be fucking shitting me.
translation.zh: ‎你他妈一定是在跟我开玩笑吧

translation.en: That guy was firing what looked like a snub-barreled submachine gun.
translation.zh:
‎那个家伙用的
‎好像是把短管轻型自动枪

translation.en: Those use 9-millimeter ammo.
This bullet in my stomach is a 44-caliber… [sighs] …rico.
translation.zh: ‎我肚子里的这颗是点44口径的跳弹

translation.en: -What does that mean? -[Bob] Ricochet.
It means she shot herself.
translation.zh: ‎意思是她的子弹打到了自己

translation.en: It means I fucking shot myself.
translation.zh: ‎意思是我他妈的打到了自己

translation.en: Young, it's me. Come let me out of this cell, okay?
translation.zh: ‎杨 是我啊 放我出去 好吗？

translation.en: You don't know what's going on out there and are wounded bad and gonna bleed out.
translation.zh:
‎你不知道发生了什么事
‎你受伤严重 会失血过多的

translation.en: Young, you know me!
This is Young. I'm trapped down here on holding with two detainees,
translation.zh:
‎我是杨 现在被困在了拘留所
‎同两名拘留人员在一起

translation.en: and I've been shot in the abdomen.
[Val] Peña and Kimball have been killed.
Be aware, we have an armed assailant on site.
translation.zh: ‎请留意 我们这里有一名武装袭击者

translation.en: He is outside the cell block at present, over.
translation.zh: ‎他目前就在拘留所的外面 完毕

translation.en: Damn.
[Teddy] Young, you don't have much time. You're bleeding out.
translation.zh: ‎杨 你的时间不多了 你在流血

translation.en: Get me out of this. Come on, I can help you.
translation.zh: ‎放我出去 快点 我可以帮你

translation.en: You have no idea what's going on. You are wounded badly.
translation.zh:
‎你不知道发生了什么事
‎你又伤得很重

translation.en: -Get me the fuck out of here. -[Val] Phew!
Ouch.
Goddamn.
Now that does appear to be bulletproof.
Goddamn. Whoo!
Anthony Lamb.
Is that big bad Bob Viddick?
Sideshow Bob, what the fuck are you doing in there?
translation.zh: ‎杂耍鲍勃 你他妈的怎么会在里面？

translation.en: You know this whack job?
Yeah, he's, uh… [smacks lips]
Well, Miss Law-and-Order, how about you open this door,
translation.zh: ‎法律与秩序小姐 不如你打开门

translation.en: we wrap this up real quick, and I get the hell out your head tout suite, huh?
translation.zh:
‎我们快点搞定这件事
‎我就不再打扰你了 好吗？

translation.en: Theodore Murretto.
I'll be a fucking monkey's uncle!
Look at you in there.
One of male grooming's greatest misfires,
translation.zh: ‎男性梳妆史上最失败的一次

translation.en: the man bun.
You look like old Tom Cruise
in that samurai picture nobody watched.
translation.zh: ‎在那部没人看的武士电影里的模样

translation.en: Goddamn! Bob, what's happening in there?
translation.zh: ‎哎哟 鲍勃 你们在里面干什么呢？

translation.en: -Uh, yeah. Hey, Anthony? -[Lamb] You know what, Bob, I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 安东尼？
‎-鲍勃 你猜怎么着 抱歉

translation.en: I'm going by the more friendly and less formal "Tony" these days.
translation.zh:
‎现如今我希望别人叫我“托尼”
‎听起来更亲切 不那么正式

translation.en: I know it's been a minute.
Hey, Anthony, I'm gonna need you to clear off this contract.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 安东尼 你得放弃这份契约

translation.en: No can do, Bob. This contract is free-fire,
translation.zh: ‎不行 鲍勃 这份契约可是自由赏金

translation.en: as there are competing parties for one Theodore Murretto.
translation.zh: ‎所有竞争同行都在追杀希尔多莫洛托

translation.en: [Bob] Hey, Anthony.
I'm not responding to that name.
translation.zh: ‎你再这样叫我 我就不回应了

translation.en: Anthony?
I'm not responding to that fucking name, Bob.
translation.zh: ‎我他妈的不会回应这个名字 鲍勃

translation.en: Doesn't Joe Totino in Chicago
have a $65,000 sticker on your head?
translation.zh:
‎是不是给你的脑袋
‎悬赏了六万五千美元？

translation.en: He does indeed, Bob.
And all he's gotten back are the heads of the assholes he sent to collect mine.
translation.zh:
‎他的收获只有那些
‎他派来抓我的混蛋们的脑袋

translation.en: Clear off my contract now, Anthony, or as God as my witness,
translation.zh:
‎安东尼 现在就放弃这份契约
‎不然我向上帝发誓

translation.en: I'm gonna cut off your fucking head, put it in a bag, and drive it to Chicago.
translation.zh:
‎我会砍掉你的脑袋
‎放进袋子里 然后送去芝加哥

translation.en: I shit you not.
Meow!
Is that a gauntlet you've thrown down there?
Are we gonna duel to the death?
Well, if so… I foresee some terrible things for you
translation.zh:
‎好吧 如果是这样的话
‎我预见到在不远的未来

translation.en: in the not-too-distant future, Bob.
translation.zh: ‎你的身上会发生很糟的事情 鲍勃

translation.en: I drew you a dick.
It just got weird.
Well, it's gonna get weirder.
You like this action, Murretto?
Murretto,
I'm coming in there, whether you like it or not.
translation.zh: ‎不管你愿不愿意 我都会进去的

translation.en: [Bob] Now you see the difference?
translation.zh: ‎现在你明白我们的区别了吗？

translation.en: That is a psychopath.
[Val over radio] 10-13. This is Officer Valerie Young.
translation.zh: ‎呼叫求助 我是瓦莱丽杨警官

translation.en: I am gravely wounded in the subfloor detention block
at the Gun Creek City Police Headquarters, copy.
translation.zh: ‎地下拘留所 我受了重伤 请回应

translation.en: Can anyone hear me?
10-13, officer in dire medical need, over.
translation.zh: ‎呼叫求助 警官急需医疗救援 完毕

translation.en: Fuck!
You're gonna run out of time, Young.
-You're gonna die. -Teddy doesn't care if you live or die.
translation.zh: ‎你会死的 ‎泰迪根本不在乎你的死活

translation.en: -Right, and you do? -Don't listen to him.
Trust me.
[Bob] Whatever that idiot says, don't--
translation.zh: ‎我不在乎那个白痴说什么 别…

translation.en: Both of you, shut the fuck up.
Goddamn.
Fuck.
[man] Valerie!
Valerie?
Are you there?
-It's Huber. -Huber, you've got an armed man out there.
translation.zh:
‎我是胡伯 ‎胡伯 外面有个武装袭击人员
‎小心点儿 我中枪了

translation.en: Watch your back. I'm shot.
translation.zh:
‎胡伯 外面有个武装袭击人员
‎小心点儿 我中枪了

translation.en: Both detainees are secure.
Suspect fled the scene.
It's over.
[Huber] Passcode ain't working.
-Did you change it? -Yeah.
Tell me what it is.
translation.zh:
‎告诉我新密码
‎这样我才能进来帮你

translation.en: -So I can get in and help you. -Where's Mitchell?
translation.zh:
‎告诉我新密码
‎这样我才能进来帮你 ‎米切尔呢？

translation.en: [Huber] They're all dead, Valerie.
I'm sorry.
Son of a bitch murdered every last man.
Where are you shot?
Didn't you hear my call out earlier?
No, I wasn't near my radio.
translation.zh: ‎没有 我没在无线收音机旁

translation.en: Valerie!
[Val] Huber.
Why were you interested in those IAFIS scans?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么对指纹扫描感兴趣？

translation.en: [Huber] What's that?
Kimball said you asked about the IAFIS scans for our DUI.
translation.zh:
‎金姆伯说你询问过
‎我们酒驾人士的指纹扫描

translation.en: [Huber] Yeah, you know, I… I just had a really bad feeling about that guy.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 你知道的
‎我就是对那家伙有种不好的预感

translation.en: Which guy?
[Huber] Viddick, the DUI.
He was processed as John Doe.
Where'd you get the name Viddick?
Where's the man who killed your fellow officers, Huber?
translation.zh: ‎杀害你同伴的那个人在哪里 胡伯？

translation.en: Is he whispering in your ear?
translation.zh: ‎他正在你的耳边说悄悄话吗？

translation.en: [Huber] They don't care about us.
All we have to do is stand down and give them Murretto.
translation.zh: ‎我们只需拱手让出莫洛托就好

translation.en: We've already lost three cops.
I can't even think about losing another one, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我不想再失去另一个了 好吗？

translation.en: You're a piece of shit, Huber, and a horrible cop.
translation.zh: ‎你是个混蛋 胡伯 你是个差劲的警察

translation.en: I never liked you, and Sarge couldn't stand you.
translation.zh:
‎我从来都不喜欢你
‎警长也一直无法忍受你

translation.en: Well, you know what, Valerie?
Sarge doesn't have to worry about me anymore,
and you're not gonna have to worry either if you keep up this Alamo bullshit.
translation.zh:
‎如果你还要继续假装英烈
‎那你很快也不用担心我了

translation.en: You already got a bullet in your belly, hon.
translation.zh: ‎你的腹部已经中弹了 亲爱的

translation.en: -Want another one in your brain? -I'd like you to try, motherfucker.
translation.zh: ‎要不要再给脑袋来一颗？ ‎你倒是试试啊 混蛋

translation.en: I'd like you to get on in here and get that bullet there.
translation.zh: ‎你有胆量就进来这里 ‎把子弹射进我的脑袋里 你行吗？

translation.en: You want to do that for me?
translation.zh: ‎把子弹射进我的脑袋里 你行吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, we are.
We're gonna come in there, you stupid fucking bitch!
translation.zh: ‎我们会进去的 你这个蠢婊子！

translation.en: You hear me?
We're getting in there!
The Teddy's dead…
[in high-pitched voice] ♪ That's what I said ♪
♪ Oh, let the man rap a plan Said he'd see him home ♪
translation.zh:
‎让那个男人说出一个计划
‎说他会送他回家

translation.en: ♪ But his hope was a rope And he should've known ♪
translation.zh: ‎但他的希望就像是绞刑 他本该知道

translation.en: ♪ I'm about to misuse him Rip him up and abuse him ♪
translation.zh: ‎我就要虐待他 撕烂他 搞砸他

translation.en: ♪ Another flunky's plan ♪
♪ And you fucked with the wrong man ♪
♪ Oh, a terrible blow But that's how it go ♪
♪ Teddy on the corner now ♪
♪ And you're gonna be a flunky, wow ♪
translation.zh: ‎你马上就会变成势利小人 喔

translation.en: ♪ Remember, Teddy dead ♪
♪ That's what I said ♪
♪ Let the man rap a plan… ♪
Actually, he's got a pretty nice voice.
[Huber] This is it.
[Lamb] Can we access it through these ducts?
translation.zh: ‎我们能通过这些管道进去吗？

translation.en: [Huber] It's 12 inches in diameter. It's way too narrow.
translation.zh: ‎管道直径只有30厘米 太窄了

translation.en: [Lamb] How about we break down that door?
[Huber sighs] Nah. This thing's like a side of a fucking tank.
translation.zh: ‎不行 那扇门就像他妈的坦克一样

translation.en: It's an armory-style door, never get in.
translation.zh: ‎是军械库式的大门 绝对进不去

translation.en: That's why I think we bust in through this wall.
translation.zh: ‎所以我想我们可以通过这面墙闯进去

translation.en: Come in through the locker room. This is Murretto's cell right here.
translation.zh:
‎从更衣室那里进去
‎莫洛托的牢房就在这里

translation.en: I mean, it's a thick son of a bitch, probably a foot of solid concrete.
translation.zh:
‎不过那面墙厚得要死
‎大概30厘米厚的混凝土实体

translation.en: Well…
let's bang some rock.
What do you think they're doing out there?
translation.zh: ‎你们说他们在外面干什么呢？

translation.en: Finding a way in.
And when they do get in,
they'll kill you first.
I would tell you to barter with them, but Lamb would just lie,
translation.zh:
‎我本想说你可以和他们讨价还价
‎但兰博只会说谎

translation.en: then strip the skin off your bones once you give him what he wants.
translation.zh:
‎然后等你满足了他的要求后
‎他会把你剥了皮

translation.en: All you had to do
was just let me blow Murretto's head off when I had the chance.
translation.zh: ‎你只需要让我一枪爆了莫洛托的头

translation.en: Then you wouldn't be sitting there with a bullet in your side,
translation.zh: ‎那样你就不会中枪坐在这里

translation.en: praying for a fucking miracle.
"Bullets before prayers."
Is that a poem?
"Bullets before prayers."
My great-grandfather had that scrawled on his Stahlhelm helmet,
translation.zh: ‎二战期间 我的曾祖父的德式头盔上

translation.en: in World War II.
Stahlhelm?
Wasn't that a German army helmet?
Your great-grandfather was a Nazi?
-But you're… -Black?
Black.
Nazis were in North Africa in the 1940s.
Just a little trivia to take from this circumstance.
translation.zh:
‎在这种情况下
‎稍稍给你们讲些小知识

translation.en: Like most Germans at the time, he had to fight. They were being overrun.
translation.zh:
‎就像当时大多数德国人一样
‎他必须战斗 他们人数不占优

translation.en: He didn't have a choice.
Yeah, déjà vu.
Wait, what?
Déjà vu.
That's not déjà vu, dummy.
-Yes, it is. -[Bob] No, it's not.
Déjà vu is when you experience the exact same thing a second time.
translation.zh:
‎情景重现是指
‎你又一次经历同样的事情

translation.en: Or the sensation that you have.
-Why are you taking his side? -How the fuck am I taking his side?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么站在他那边？ ‎我怎么会站在他那边？

translation.en: You said that your great-grandfather had to fight, that he was overrun,
translation.zh:
‎你说你的曾祖父不得不战斗
‎因为他们人数不占优

translation.en: and he had no choice.
Like me, sitting right here.
Déjà vu.
Okay, whatever, you win.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 随便你 你赢了

translation.en: Anybody else feel cold?
Hey, look at me. Young, don't close your eyes.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 看着我 杨 别闭眼

translation.en: Throw me the keys. Throw me the keys.
You're better off bleeding to death. Do not give him the keys.
translation.zh: ‎你宁愿流血而死也别把钥匙给他

translation.en: You're gonna listen to that contract killer, or me?
translation.zh:
‎你打算听那个职业杀手的话
‎还是我的话？

translation.en: Are you fucking kidding? He's a mob-flunky con man.
translation.zh:
‎你他妈在开玩笑吗？
‎他可是个黑帮走狗 职业骗子

translation.en: Who would you rather have fighting for your life right now, Val?
Not you.
-Never you. -[Bob] Why?
'Cause I'm the bad guy?
Shit.
Here they come.
Hey, asshole.
You gonna help me, or just sit there eating that shit?
translation.zh: ‎你打算帮我 还是坐在那里吃东西？

translation.en: We just got but the one hammer there, hoss.
translation.zh: ‎就差一锤子就好了 大块头

translation.en: Yeah, I get that, but I thought that maybe we could switch, you know?
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我知道
‎但我想兴许我们可以换一下？

translation.en: Trade-off.
Oh, come on, man. I already killed four people tonight.
translation.zh:
‎拜托 伙计
‎我今晚已经杀了四个人了

translation.en: Including two of your coworkers. I… am bushed.
translation.zh: ‎包括你的两个同事 ‎我累死了

translation.en: I killed my fucking sergeant tonight
and an innocent civilian.
Yeah, well…
You in the cop business,
so that makes you a murderer.
But I'm in the murder business, so that just makes me a laborer.
translation.zh:
‎但我是干杀手这行的
‎所以我只是在做劳工而已

translation.en: Do you see how that works?
You're fucking crazy.
And also, on top of it, not to beat a dead horse,
translation.zh: ‎况且除此之外 你也不必白费口舌

translation.en: but you could use some physical activity.
Motherfucker.
Come on, man. I can't imagine your wife likes you sliding all up on top of her,
translation.zh:
‎拜托 伙计 我简直无法想象
‎你老婆会喜欢你坐在她身上

translation.en: looking like a big old Hot Pocket with a hard-on.
translation.zh:
‎看起来像一坨过期的馅饼
‎还挺着个鸡鸡

translation.en: I mean, don't you want to look like that one time?
Fucking Chris Hemsworth
"enjoys the beach today with his wife, Elsa Pataky."
translation.zh:
‎“和他的老婆
‎埃尔莎帕塔奇在海边享受度假”

translation.en: Just one time in your life, don't you want to look like Thor?
translation.zh:
‎这一生中 你难道不想变成雷神吗
‎哪怕就一次？

translation.en: Of course you do!
It's only gonna happen with hard work
translation.zh: ‎只有努力工作 挥起强力之锤

translation.en: and a-swinging of the mighty hammer.
So, carry on, my Norseman.
Come on, Thor!
I think we're out of prayers, Young.
translation.zh: ‎杨 我想我们已经没希望了

translation.en: I don't wanna see you bleed out,
and I don't wanna see anybody take the skin off your bones.
translation.zh: ‎我也不想看到别人剥掉你的皮

translation.en: I just wanna get the fuck out--
[Bob] You wanna see a way through this? Don't listen to him.
Throw me the fucking keys.
Think he's gonna make it through? And if he does, you're gonna see him again?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得他能逃出去吗？
‎如果能 你还能再见到他回来？

translation.en: [Bob] Oh, you gotta be fucking kidding me. That blood loss has made you loopy, lady.
translation.zh:
‎你他妈在开玩笑吧
‎失血让你神智不清了 女士

translation.en: [Val] I don't wanna die in here if I can help it.
translation.zh: ‎如果可以 我可不想死在这里

translation.en: And I'm trusting you, Teddy,
to do as you say and help me, and not run from this.
translation.zh:
‎相信你会照你所说的来帮我
‎而不是逃走

translation.en: [Bob] All Teddy does is run.
He's running from me. He ran to you. How do you think he got in here?
translation.zh:
‎他逃离了我 他跑去找你
‎你以为他是怎么进来的？

translation.en: He sucker-punched a cop. You!
translation.zh: ‎他偷袭了一个警察 就是你

translation.en: -I got that last week. -Fuck!
I want it back.
[Bob] Oh, you just fucked us both.
In the kitchen, next to the intake lobby,
there's a trauma kit above the fridge.
[Bob] He's a fucking opportunist. That's all he is.
translation.zh: ‎他是个机会主义者 他就是这种人

translation.en: [Val] Please bring that back here.
I won't make it otherwise, Teddy.
Ask Officer Young where your ex-wife and son are, Teddy.
translation.zh:
‎问问杨警官
‎你的前妻和儿子在哪里 泰迪

translation.en: You said you sent out a unit to check on them?
translation.zh: ‎你说你派了一队警察去查看他们？

translation.en: Did that unit ever arrive, Officer Young?
translation.zh: ‎那队警察真的去了吗 杨警官？

translation.en: Are Teddy's family all wrapped away safe and sound?
translation.zh: ‎泰迪的家人真的平安无事吗？

translation.en: Young.
Where are they?
I'm sorry, Teddy.
What?
Look, I'm sorry.
Did you know my family was dead, Viddick?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我的家人死了吗 维迪克？

translation.en: You couldn't have saved them anyway, Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎反正你也救不了他们 泰迪

translation.en: You doomed them a long time ago.
translation.zh: ‎你早就已经把他们的人生给毁了

translation.en: Did you kill my family, Bob?
translation.zh: ‎是你杀了我的家人吗 鲍勃？

translation.en: I didn't.
Lamb have something to do with it?
-[Bob] I can't be sure. -Best guess.
[Bob] Where were they found?
In a runoff slough near Lake Mead.
Yeah, it was him.
They didn't tell me karma was a butt-naked tranny with a mask on.
translation.zh:
‎他们没告诉我会遇到
‎一个戴着面具、露着屁股的异装癖

translation.en: You can't say "tranny," you have to say transvestite.
translation.zh:
‎你不能说“异装癖”
‎你现在得说“异性装扮者”

translation.en: -That's what you call 'em? Fuck that. -Now you have to say transvestite.
translation.zh:
‎-现在得这么说了？
‎-你得说“异性装扮者”

translation.en: Hey, where the fuck is everybody?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 大家都他妈去哪儿了？

translation.en: They still doing construction this late?
-They shouldn't be. -[banging]
What the fuck is this?
What the fuck happened here?
Come on, man.
[panting] This fucking thing's taking forever.
Huber, what the fuck?
Hi, you guys.
You're back. Why are you back?
translation.zh: ‎你们回来了 你们怎么回来了？

translation.en: We ran out to a scene for Val.
translation.zh: ‎我们帮瓦莱丽去看了一个现场

translation.en: What the fuck are you doing? And who's this?
translation.zh: ‎你他妈在干什么？这个人是谁？

translation.en: Why does he have a--
No!
No, wait, hold on.
Huber, I don't know nothing. I didn't see nothing.
translation.zh:
‎胡伯 我什么都不知道
‎我什么都没看到

translation.en: Hey, man, I got kids.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 兄弟 我还有孩子

translation.en: He's not gonna say anything. Tell him you're not gonna say anything!
translation.zh: ‎他什么都不会说的 快告诉他！

translation.en: I swear to fucking Christ, I won't say anything.
translation.zh: ‎我对天发誓 我什么都不会说的

translation.en: Are you sure?
-You can trust him. He's my friend. -Oh, you all friends?
translation.zh:
‎-你可以信任他 他是我的朋友
‎-你们是朋友吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Then you shoot him, all friendly-like.
I can't. Not Barnes.
translation.zh: ‎我做不到 不能对巴恩斯这样

translation.en: -You shot your sergeant. -This man means something to me.
translation.zh: ‎你打死了警长 ‎这个人对我来说很重要

translation.en: I'm gonna walk over there and empty the contents of this weapon into his face.
translation.zh:
‎我会走过去
‎把这把枪里的所有子弹都打进他的脸

translation.en: So if you plan to be more humane, now is the fucking time.
translation.zh:
‎所以如果你想搞得人性化一些
‎现在正是时候

translation.en: No. Huber, come on, man.
He's shot and wounded! [exclaims]
-[Huber] Sorry, Barnes. You were right. -Look at me, dude. Look at me.
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 巴恩斯 你说得对
‎-看着我 伙计

translation.en: -[Lamb] Fucking Huber, end it. -You know my kids. I promised I'd be home.
translation.zh:
‎-该死的胡伯 快点动手！
‎-你认识我的孩子们

translation.en: I know, just close your eyes, all right?
translation.zh: ‎我知道 闭上眼睛就好 好吗？

translation.en: [Bob] Please tell me your grand plan was not freeing that fucking idiot
translation.zh:
‎拜托告诉我
‎你的伟大计划不是放走那个白痴

translation.en: putting a gun in his hand?
What choice did I have?
[Bob] Freeing and arming me.
You're a hired killer.
I wish you knew what I knew about him.
translation.zh: ‎我真希望你也知道他做过的事情

translation.en: You were so hell-bent on saving the day that you wound up shooting yourself.
translation.zh:
‎你这么拼命地拯救这一切
‎结果却打伤了自己

translation.en: I don't wanna live in a world where people like you win, Viddick.
translation.zh:
‎我不想生活在
‎你这种人会胜利的世界 维迪克

translation.en: Right.
[clicks tongue] You'll just safeguard a lying asshole and give your life to protect his.
translation.zh:
‎你只是保护了一个撒谎的混蛋
‎然后用自己的生命来保护他

translation.en: Should I live like you, Bob?
translation.zh: ‎我应该像你一样活着吗 鲍勃？

translation.en: It's honest.
It's lawless.
And I won't stand for it.
[Bob] No, you'll just sit there and bleed out instead.
translation.zh: ‎不 你就坐在那里流血而死吧

translation.en: Come on. Give me the keys.
Give me the keys, Valerie.
No.
And don't call me Valerie. It's creepy.
translation.zh: ‎别叫我瓦莱丽 听着很诡异

translation.en: What the fuck?
How'd you do that, Bob?
Let's put a pin in that right now, Val.
I just wanted to see how our little friendship would play out.
translation.zh:
‎我只想看看
‎我们之间的小小友谊会变成什么样

translation.en: Pretty soon, you're gonna lose consciousness.
You're gonna fall asleep, and you're not gonna wake up.
translation.zh: ‎你会睡着 并且不会再醒来

translation.en: Then will you listen to my dying wish before I do?
translation.zh:
‎那在我死之前
‎你愿意听我的遗愿吗？

translation.en: You have someone you love.
Don't we all?
No, we don't. But you do.
translation.zh: ‎不 我们没有 但你有

translation.en: No, that's your left hand, your gun hand.
translation.zh: ‎不 那是你的左手 你用枪的手

translation.en: Not gonna wear a ring there.
You're married.
You wanna see him again?
Teddy's not coming back. You can trust me on that.
translation.zh:
‎泰迪不会回来了
‎这一点你可以相信我

translation.en: You said you wanted to take your chances.
Here they are.
You either sit there and bleed out,
or give me the goddamn keys.
♪ Mother-Teddy dead, motherfucker ♪
translation.zh: ‎他妈的泰迪熊 你这个混蛋

translation.en: ♪ Ooh, that's what I said ♪
♪ And the motherfucking Teddy's dead ♪
[Lamb] Teddy!
You shot me!
[Lamb] Teddy, you could have stopped this whole goddamn mess, man,
translation.zh: ‎泰迪 你本来不必走到这一步的

translation.en: and saved your family too.
Because all they wanted was those names.
translation.zh: ‎因为他们只想要你说出那些名字

translation.en: Well, and all the money you stole.
translation.zh: ‎当然 还有你偷走的那些钱

translation.en: You thieving little motherfucker.
Ah, you shooting at shadows, Mr. Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎你在打影子呢 泰迪先生

translation.en: Yeah, you better conserve that ammo.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你最好留着那支弹药

translation.en: [in singsong] You're gonna need it!
♪ And if you wanna be a gunfighter Remember, Teddy's dead ♪
translation.zh:
‎如果你想成为枪手
‎记住 泰迪已经死了

translation.en: Fuck.
Officer Huber.
Listen, I-- [grunts]
-No… -[taser whines, discharges]
[Lamb] I sedated them, Teddy.
They were sound asleep when I put the Ziplocs over them.
translation.zh:
‎我给他们套上塑料袋时
‎他们睡得可熟了

translation.en: It didn't take but two minutes. I didn't want them to suffer.
translation.zh:
‎只花了两分钟就结束了
‎我不想让他们受苦

translation.en: They didn't fuck up, Teddy. You did.
translation.zh: ‎他们没有搞砸 泰迪 搞砸的人是你

translation.en: You're the fuck-up of the family.
And then I laid them in the water.
We all deserve the water in the end, no matter what we've done.
translation.zh:
‎不管我们做过什么
‎我们最终都应回归水中

translation.en: It's fucking Huber.
What?
Anthony.
All right, now it hurts.
I'm gonna need something just a little bigger, Anthony,
translation.zh: ‎安东尼 我需要一件更大一点的武器

translation.en: to cut off your head.
That's your reaction?
Mother-- Fuck--
Motherfucker…
Parley.
What?
Pirate code.
A temporary ceasefire to achieve a common end.
As in, this end.
Our little lost Lamb isn't dead just yet.
translation.zh: ‎我们这位迷失的小兰博还没死

translation.en: So I'm gonna let you send him off.
Revenge for your family.
Then you and I are going to resume--
[Lamb] Oh, man!
Motherfucker.
The water.
The water.
[Val] Not bad, is it?
That's jackfruit.
It's not chicken.
I mix some garlic and cilantro with store-bought coleslaw.
translation.zh:
‎我把一些大蒜和香菜
‎拌进了商店买的凉拌卷心菜里

translation.en: -That's the secret. -Val?
Teddy.
You never came back.
I was coming back, Val.
I was grabbing this kit right here, and I was coming back.
translation.zh: ‎我准备拿走这个急救包 然后回去

translation.en: Oh.
So you were gonna bring it after you ate,
translation.zh: ‎所以你是打算在你吃完之后

translation.en: but before you lit this place on fire?
translation.zh: ‎把这里烧着之前再回去找我？

translation.en: And where's my gun?
Am I gonna get that back?
That's okay.
I got my friend's gun.
My dead friend.
I heard that machine gun of yours making quite the statement.
translation.zh: ‎我听到你那把机关枪的枪击声了

translation.en: So, have you seen Huber?
Lamb?
Viddick?
There it is.
My own bullet that I put in my stomach protecting you.
translation.zh: ‎我射进自己腹部的子弹 ‎为了保护你而中的

translation.en: Viddick was right about you.
But…
we are what we are.
Always.
You seem to always have so much to say. Nothing new now?
translation.zh:
‎你似乎总有很多话要说
‎现在没得说了？

translation.en: I was just wondering where all this is going.
translation.zh: ‎我只是在想这件事会怎样发展

translation.en: Yeah.
Me too.
I guess we'll find out soon.
I radioed in a Code 3, also known as a Hot Call,
translation.zh:
‎我用无线发送了求助信号
‎也就是紧急呼救

translation.en: so we're ten minutes away from our parking lot being flooded
translation.zh: ‎所以十分钟后 方圆30公里以内

translation.en: with every available law enforcement officer
within a 20-mile radius.
And I just took an adrenaline shot.
translation.zh: ‎我刚刚注射了一剂肾上腺素

translation.en: So I'm feeling a little rambunctious.
translation.zh: ‎所以我现在感觉有点难以控制

translation.en: Shame.
You could run.
So you could shoot me in the back?
translation.zh: ‎这样你就可以在背后开枪打我了？

translation.en: You already stabbed me in mine.
translation.zh: ‎你不是也在背后捅了我一刀么

translation.en: I think we should get you back to your cell now, Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎我想现在应该把你送回牢房了 泰迪

translation.en: Unless you had something else in mind.
Thank you, Sarge.
Thanks, Peña.
[Val] Never more than a day ahead of the devil, Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎很快就会被恶魔追上了 泰迪

translation.en: But maybe I'm your devil now.
translation.zh: ‎不过也许我现在就是那个恶魔

translation.en: And this is our day.
Can't run from this.
Hell's already here.
You know, Val,
I'm just sitting here wondering
